DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select PS.PortfolioId as [Portfolio ID], Coalesce(ACC.DisplayName, 'Anonymous account') as [Account Name], (Stuff(( select (', ' + cast(M.MediaId as varchar(max))) from tbMedia M where M.TicketMediaMatchId=PS.PortfolioId for XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') ) as [Media IDs], (Stuff(( select (', ' + cast(MC.MediaCode as varchar(max))) from tbMedia M left join tbMediaCode MC on MC.MediaId=M.MediaId where M.TicketMediaMatchId=PS.PortfolioId for XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') ) as [Media Codes], MP.MembershipPointCode as [Reward Point Code], MP.MembershipPointName as [Reward Point Name], PS.SlotBalance as [Balance] from tbPortfolioSlot PS left join tbMembershipPoint MP on MP.MembershipPointId=PS.MembershipPointId left join tbTicketMediaMatch TMM on TMM.TicketMediaMatchId=PS.PortfolioId left join tbAccount ACC on ACC.AccountId=tmm.AccountId where PS.SlotBalance<>0 and MP.MembershipPointCode<>'#WALLET'

RichDescItem.Description:
Reward point grouped Report

Abstract

"Reward point grouped‚Äù generates a report of the log of the Reward Points.

Generating the report

Parameter Input
No parameters.

Output File Extension
Built-in wizards will help you easily and quickly generate at your choice reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Format selection is required before running the report.
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:
  • [Execution date/time] -Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]

Contents (by Columns)

The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information.
  • [Portfolio ID] - Portfolio ID
  • [Account Name] - Account Name
  • [Media IDs] - Media IDs
  • [Media Codes] - Media Codes
  • [Reward Point Code] - Reward Point Code
  • [Reward Point Name] - Reward Point Name
  • [Balance] - Net Balance in local currency
